Descriptions of Individual Special Provision Codes
The table below contains descriptions for each of the seven special provision codes.
Code
Description
1
Indicates Medal of Honor pension under
38 CFR 3.802
.
2
Indicates naval pension allowance under
38 CFR 3.803
.
3
Indicates extra-schedular entitlement to individual unemployability or pension under
38 CFR 3.321(b)
.
Note
:  In legacy systems, any extra-schedular evaluation was identified by entry of
ES
following the specific diagnostic code (DC).
4
Indicates an under-schedular evaluation (by reason of deduction of the pre-service level of disability) to a pre-service disability aggravated by service.
Note
:  In legacy systems, any under-schedular evaluation was identified by entry of
US
following the specific DC.
5
Indicates the Veteran is incarcerated, and pension is being awarded to dependents under
38 CFR 3.666
.
6
Indicates
computer audit acceptance of any combination of the special provision codes
a total evaluation is continued because it is protected under
38 CFR 3.951
, or
acceptance of a combined evaluation that is not justified by the individual evaluations.
7
Indicates receipt of compensation or Dependency Indemnity Compensation (DIC) under
38 U.S.C. 1151
.
